This meditation changed my life. Full stop. I first discovered this video about a year and a half ago, at one of the lowest points of my life. I found myself sobbing the entire time, and that’s when I realized that I wasn’t truly living, and I had the power and desire to get better. I started practicing yoga and meditating every day, being intentional about my lifestyle and food choices, worked at shifting my mindset, and made uncovering and embodying my highest self a priority. I had wrapped myself in layers upon layers of conditioning, masks, and limiting beliefs; I felt that I was drowning. It took a lot of self-awareness and effort, but it was worth it. After this video popped up again in RENEW, everything came full circle and I was hit with a wave of realization and gratitude. I’m so grateful for everything I have experienced and learned, and how far I’ve come. I’m at a point in my life where I can fully embrace my authentic self, and am fortunate to have the opportunity to empower others to come into alignment with their authentic self.

If you are struggling, just know that you are enough, and you have the power to be your own hero. Start today with small shifts, and it will keep growing little by little. One day you will look back, with your eyes welled up with tears, and come to the realization that you fully and truly love yourself, and share it with the world. And it will be beautiful. 💜
